title: Jackson & Malone
overview: The series by director Max Porcelijn follows two detectives who investigate the murder of three elderly women. The story takes place in the idyllic Spulne, where three elderly women are brutally murdered. To solve the case, it is decided to use the most serious means: detectives Jackson and Malone from the all-powerful Extreme Crime Combat Service. As the pair are drawn deeper and deeper into the world of the striking residents of Spulne, they will eventually have to face their own demons to unravel the mystery.
